[`LivePreviewStateType`](../LivePreviewStateType) › [`mousedown`](./mousedown)

## LivePreviewStateType.mousedown property

True if the left mouse is currently held down in the editor (for example, when drag-to-select text).

**Signature:**

```typescript
mousedown: boolean;
```
